page.title: 12HARWOOD HALL: UPMINSTER
page.content: {Harwood Hall}is situated along a quiet country lane at the end of Corbet's Tey road. It is an{equestrian centre of national importance. Showjumping events,gymkhanas, & dog shows are held there regularly; whilst in 1982 an international showjumping event was staged. There is a large indoor arena, used for amateur & professional events & coaching in winter. The outdoor arena is in the grounds to the hall which can also be used for accommodating the spectators & competitors during competitions, which may feature fancy dress items & races as well as the serious events. The hall itself was built over 200 years ago in 1772.
